task.label: Fuel Rocket
task.text: The rocket consists of three stages—the S-IC first stage, S-II second stage and the S-IVB third stage—and the instrument unit. All three stages use liquid oxygen (LOX) as the oxidizer. The first stage uses RP-1 for fuel, while the second and third stages use liquid hydrogen (LH2)

task.label: Landing Quote
task.text: Say something witty when you are on the moon
